text: Skazhi im (o Mukhammad!): " Ne v moyey vlasti prinesti sebe pol'zu ili otvratit' ot sebya durnoye, yesli togo ne pozhelayet Allakh. V moyey vlasti tol'ko to, chto zakhochet Allakh. Yesli by ya znal sokrovennoye, kak vy dumayete, ya by umnozhil vso dobroye v sebe i ne podvergalsya by durnomu, izbegaya vsego, chto yego vyzyvayet. YA - lish' tol'ko uveshchevatel', preduprezh- dayushchiy o nakazanii, i vestnik o nagrade dlya tekh, kotoryye uverovali v Istinu Allakha i poklonyayutsya Yemu
